name: Miller's Planet
description: A tidal-locked ocean planet orbiting Gargantua. Time is heavily dilated here.

name: Mann's Planet
description: An icy world with treacherous terrain and atmosphere. It orbits Gargantua further out.

name: Minecraft
description: A pixelated world floating in the cosmos, this cube-shaped planet is made entirely of blocksâ€”dirt, stone, ores, and biomes stacked layer upon layer.
